about.title: About Me
about.presentation: My name is Magno Nascimento, I am {{age}} years old, I study Information Systems at Universidade Federal do Estado do Rio de Janeiro (UNIRIO) and I currently work as a Fullstack Developer (more focused on Back-End) at HURB.
description: I'm passionate about what I do and I'm always trying to be up to speed with the current trends in the market. I always seek for delivering quality and value to the projects I'm working on.
I also have some interest for finance, reading, gaming, and music.
If you need anything, you can find me using one of the links below... You may contact me, I'm nice, I swear! ðŸ˜…

jobProjects.projectDescription: I'm involved with the main projects in the company's payments area, working on demands for internal operation teams, as well as for suppliers (B2B) and end customers (B2C).

I helped developing and maintaining the Portal Minha Oi at the time of a big visual identity change for the Front-End, managing to put in practice all the previous knowledge in Node and React obtained through self-study. I had the opportunity to get involved with both Front-End (React) and Back-End (Node). In this project I also used MongoDB, Redis (cache), OracleDB, Kibana (logs) and several other integrations.

I worked on some RPA projects (Robotic Process Automation) and their respectives REST APIs in order to automate procedures performed by the employees on some legacy systems. In this project I used Java with Spring Boot, C#, Python and OracleDB.

jobProjects.projectTitle: Intrexon - Web application for research team
jobProjects.projectDescription: I worked on the development and maintaining a web application to support a research team, centering all the research information in OracleDB and displaying them through a user friendly interface. My main role in this project was working with the Back-End.
